snippet.title: Gourdlets - Official Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2023
snippet.description: Design a cozy village, decorate, and take another look at the colorful world of Gourdlets in this trailer for the upcoming city-building sandbox. Place buildings and scenery, and then watch visiting gourdlets arrive and interact with the world.
